articles.description: England's miserable tour of India ends with another heavy defeat as they suffer a 3-0 one-day international series loss.
articles.title: India vs England: Hosts wrap up 3-0 ODI series win with 142-run thrashing in Ahmedabad

articles.description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe is considering further redundancies at the club.
articles.title: Man Utd: Ineos considering further redundancies at the club

articles.description: Henry Pollock, the fast-rising back row prospect, is brought into England's training camp after a minor injury to Tom Curry.
articles.title: Six Nations: Henry Pollock included in England camp

articles.description: Australia spinner Matthew Kuhnemann is reported for a suspected illegal bowling action following Test series in Sri Lanka.
articles.title: Australia spinner Matthew Kuhnemann reported for suspected illegal bowling action

articles.description: World number seven Elena Rybakina says she is "disappointed" at the WTA's decision to uphold the ban against her former coach Stefano Vukov following an independent investigation into his behaviour towards the player.
articles.title: Stefano Vukov: Elena Rybakina 'disappointed' with former coach's ban

articles.description: The US Open receives strong criticism following its decision to hold its mixed doubles competition as a standalone event before the start of the Slam.
articles.title: US Open: Slam's decision to hold mixed doubles as standalone event criticised

articles.description: London Irish Rugby Club are bought out of administration by a consortium led by former Formula One team owner and businessman Eddie Jordan.
articles.title: London Irish: Eddie Jordan-led consortium buys club out of administration

articles.description: Manchester City's lack of belief and ageing squad is exposed by ruthless Real Madrid to leave their Champions League hopes in danger, writes BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty
articles.title: Manchester City's ageing squad brutally exposed by Real Madrid in Champions League defeat

articles.description: As Goodison Park prepares to host its final Merseyside derby, we look back at the history of Everton v Liverpool matches.
articles.title: Everton v Liverpool preview: Best Goodison Park Merseyside derbies

articles.description: Australia's difficult build-up to the Champions Trophy is hit further by a 49-run defeat by Sri Lanka in Colombo.
articles.title: Australia lose to Sri Lanka in Champions Trophy build-up
